thread.title: Fair City

author: Fiona Flynn
title: Fair City
text: Well would you look who it is. Heather is back! Last time we saw her she was fleeing the country on account of her husband assisting her half bro/former lover to die. Good times. She returns with Renee tonight along with her daughter Eleanor although not everybody is happy to see her, and by that, we mean Farrah, who never really could handle her jealousy of Heather. Also tonight, Charlotte continues her meddling in this whole Sash/Nina/Laura love triangle, while Carol decides to play matchmaker for Dan. 'Cos that's not weird at all.
